Changelog
=========

1.0.2 (2009-05-13)
------------------

* Fix a bug with a translation in action.xml [tamosauskas]

1.0.1
-----

* Initial Public Release to PyPi and Plone.org

* Includes xcf file for easy customization

* i18n support

1.0 - Unreleased
----------------

* Sao Paulo / Brazil, visual Theme
